content.query:
select categoria, codigo, subcodigo1, sum(cp.valorpg), count(cp.codigo)
  from dbGestaoLojarefined..contasapagar cp
 where cp.ano_pg = 2022 and cp.mes_pg = 5
 group by categoria, codigo, subcodigo1
 order by codigo,subcodigo1

 select sum(cp.valorpg)
  from dbGestaoLojarefined..contasapagar cp
 where cp.ano_pg = 2022 and cp.mes_pg = 5


 select categoria,';', descricao,';', diavencto
  from dbGestaoLojarefined..contasapagar cp
 where cp.ano_pg = 2022 and cp.mes_pg = 5 and codigo is null and subcodigo1 is NULL
 order by codigo,subcodigo1
